gods.name: Zeus
gods.domains: God of the sky, lightning, thunder, law, order, justice, King of the Gods and the “Father of Gods and men”.

gods.name: Athena
gods.domains: Goddess of wisdom, poetry, art, and war strategy. Daughter of Zeus and born from his forehead fully grown, wearing battle armour.

gods.name: Hera
gods.domains: Goddess of goddesses, women, and marriage. Married to Zeus and known as Queen of the Gods.

gods.name: Dionysus
gods.domains: An Olympian god of the grape harvest, winemaking and wine, of ritual madness, religious ecstasy and theatre.
